TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDuplexSessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public Interface IDuplexSessionChannel Implements IDuplexChannel, ISessionChannel(Of IDuplexSession)

Docs.summary: 定義會將雙工通道與工作階段產生關聯的介面。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel> 介面會指示 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexChannel> 實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSession> 語意 (Semantics)。
在有提供 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel> 時，它的關聯 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSession> 可以透過 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> 屬性來擷取。
